name: Seven Days Of Halloween
description:
On account of Junya Ikeda aka Gai Ikari/ GokaiSilver 's Birthday

and 10th Anniversary of Gokaigers.

In this game, you fight against ghosts bats and other Halloween enemies.

You unlock a new weapon each day.
Win one day to unlock the other.

Even Gokaiger weapons are available.

If you win each game you win, else you lose.

The weapons are rotated by the mouse pointer.

So enjoy!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
